quote:
I was the one you always dreamed of
You were the one I tried to draw
How dare you say it's nothing to me
Baby, you're the only light I ever saw
author: Slowly Dancing In A Burning Room, John Mayer

quote:
We look for love no time for tears
Wasted water's all that is
And it don't make no flowers grow
author: Just The Two Of Us, Bill Withers

quote:
Will you take me to nirvana?
I don't think this will last
But you're here in my arms
author: Nirvana, Sam Smith

quote:
You were my September Song, summer lasted too long
Time moves so slowly, when you're only fifteen
You were my September Song, tell me where have you gone
Do you remember me, we were only fifteen
author: September Song, JP Cooper

quote:
And you can tell everybody this is your song
It may be quite simple but now that it's done
I hope you don't mind
I hope you don't mind that I put down in words
How wonderful life is while you're in the world
author: Your Song, Elton John

quote:
You know I've seen a lot of what the world can do
And it's breakin' my heart in two
Because I never wanna see you a sad girl
Don't be a bad girl
author: Wild World, Cat Stevens

quote:
I used to rule the world
Seas would rise when I gave the word
Now in the morning I sleep alone
Sweep the streets I used to own
author: Viva La Vida, Coldplay

quote:
There must be an angel with a smile on her face,
When she thought up that I should be with you.
But it's time to face the truth,
I will never be with you.
author: You're Beautiful, James Blunt

quote:
May be surrounded by
A million people I
Still feel all alone
I just wanna go home
Oh, I miss you, you know
author: Home, Michael Buble

quote:
Will you still love me
When I'm no longer young and beautiful?
Will you still love me
When I got nothing but my aching soul?
author: Young And Beautiful, Lana Del Rey

quote:
How many times do I have to tell you
Even when you're crying you're beautiful too
The world is beating you down, I'm around through every mood
You're my downfall, you're my muse
My worst distraction, my rhythm and blues
author: All Of Me, John Legend

quote:
I tried carrying the weight of the world
But I only have two hands
Hope I get the chance to travel the world
But I don't have any plans
author: Wake Me Up, Avicii

quote:
Yesterday
Suddenly I'm not half the man I used to be.
There's a shadow hanging over me.
Oh, yesterday came suddenly.
author: Yesterday, The Beatles

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: What I Talk About When I Talk About Running, Haruki Murakami

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote:
You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one
I hope someday you'll join us
And the world will live as one.
author: Imagine, John Lennon

quote: And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
author: The Alchemist, Paulo Coelho

quote: Itâ€™s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
author: Alice in Wonderland, Lewis Carroll

quote: You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
author: Winnie-the-Pooh, A.A. Milne

quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven..
author: Paradise Lost, John Milton

quote: When I'm running I don't have to talk to anybody and don't have to listen to anybody. This is a part of my day I can't do without.
author: What I Talk About When I Talk About Running, Haruki Murakami
